# Live Demo

1. We will demonstrate where to find R and R Studio, and what RStudio looks like.

2. We will use RStudio as a calculator.

3. We will demonstrate some simple R commands using the `mtcars` dataset.


# Have a go

Try running this code yourself, based on the `iris` data.
Then make small changes and see what happens!

```{r}
1+1

# IDA for iris data
head(iris)
tail(iris)
help(iris)
```

# Coding Challenge
Using the data() command, select another preloaded data set and use the techniques outlined above to explore the data.

Hint: Select a dataset under 'Data sets in package ‘datasets’'
